description.zh-CN: 遵循WCAG 2.1 AA标准的包容性政务服务门户，具备高对比度、清晰的阅读层级、屏幕阅读器友好、键盘导航支持、可访问的表单等功能。
description.en-US: Accessible government service portal designed for inclusivity and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, featuring high contrast, clear reading hierarchy, screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and accessible forms.
